page.title: 03SHOPPING IN CAUNTON
page.content: {POST OFFICE/GENERAL STORE. { }There is only one shop in the grid area.This is a post office and general store situated in the centre of Caunton.It is owned by Mr&Mrs Kimber. The store was built in 1850.The people who wanted it built had to pay groceries instead of the Â£25 that it cost to build.Throughout the war the post office moved a few times. Today however the shop is like any shop.The post office&shop closes on Wednesday and Sunday afternoons,on Christmas Day,Boxing Day and New Years Day.Otherwise it is open from 6.00.am till 7.00.pm.
